alert.note: Alert for Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 2:27PM MDT until March 30 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM WEDNESDAY TO 9 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches in the mountains above 6500 feet MSL and 3 to 6 inches in the valleys below. * WHERE...Howe, Arco, Mackay, Chilly, Lost River Range, Challis, and Clayton. * WHEN...From 9 AM Wednesday to 9 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys
